data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 30,952 believers in Chiquimula, Guatemala a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chiquimula, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Chiquimula to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help 24 new simple churches start among the 124,000 people in the state of Chiquimula, Guatemala. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Chiquimula, Guatemala and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Spanish-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Spanish-speaking people is yours.
Father, comfort those who mourn in Chiquimula, Guatemala.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Chiquimula, Guatemala.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Chiquimula words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Chiquimula
location.people_groups_list: Aguacatec, Ixil, Chajul, Arab, Palestinian, Han Chinese, Cantonese, Achi, Cubulco
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Aguacatec (13,000), Ixil, Chajul (44,000), Arab, Palestinian (1,600), Han Chinese, Cantonese (3,700), Achi, Cubulco (81,000)
